title: External Tools do get empty %username% %password% fields
author: seju7
body_snippet:
For my connections I am mainly use the default username and password settings under Tools>Options>Connections>"For empty Username, Password or Domain fields use:".

![grafik](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/27007110/24797233/9d319318-1b90-11e7-94e2-c630384078ae.png)

When I call an external tools with %hostname%, %username% and %password%, where the config for this connections has empty fields for username & password, empty fields are passed on, instead of the default settings.
...

comments.author: sparerd
comments.snippet: I believe it was designed this way (to only use the default user/pass when connecting to the machine), or maybe was just an oversight. I'm going to tag this as a "feature request" since nothing is technically broken, though I agree that we should expect the default credentials to be available everywhere in the application.
